title: Activity-Based Health Science Education Design: Self-Directed Learning Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic life sciences and human anatomy
context.additional_context: Customized training to enhance practical application skills in health sciences.

learning_goals: Learners can establish data-driven problem-solving strategies by analyzing real-world health science cases.
Learners can design health risk assessment models using activity-based learning tools.
Learners can finalize health promotion strategies through peer evaluation and iterative improvement processes based on project outcomes.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
